lead_paragraph: If the merger of the London Stock Exchange and Deutsche Boerse goes ahead, it would have its head office in London as planned, LSE Chief Executive Xavier Rolet said on Friday.
snippet: If the merger of the London Stock Exchange and Deutsche Boerse goes ahead, it would have its head office in London as planned, LSE Chief Executive Xavier Rolet said on Friday....

headline.main: North Korean Suspect in Airport Murder to Be Deported From Malaysia and Not Allowed Back
